description: Shiroyama Eriko is http://anidb.net/ch145182 [Kusakabe Kanna]`s classmate who is going out with http://anidb.net/ch149275 [Kobori Takumi], a boy also from their class. She is jelaous of Takumi`s relationship with a girl from upper class, http://anidb.net/ch149274 [Kitamura Mina], who is also his childhood friend.
name: Shiroyama Eriko
